item.title: How to filter spam mails and block senders in Mail on Mac
item.description: If you’re on a spam mailing list and the unsuscribe option in Mail hasn’t worked, here are some alternate ways of putting them in the right place (out of your mailbox): 1. Use rules to automate spam identification and deletion If you find yourself manually identifying spam mail and then deleting it, creating a Rule can help automate that for you. Here’s an example of a rule I use to delete spam mail before I even see them:
